changeSet.createView: SELECT w.name AS workspace, wa.key AS wsp_key, wa.description AS wsp_desc, b.id, b.name, b.description, b.notes, up.name AS updated_by, b.version FROM existential b JOIN existential up ON b.updated_by = up.id LEFT JOIN workspace_authorization wa ON b.workspace = wa.id LEFT JOIN existential w ON wa.defining_product = w.id WHERE b.domain = 'Unit'
